summary:
{
  "executive_summary": "The video discusses the differences between traditional Rag and Agentic Rag systems, and how to convert a traditional Rag system to an Agentic Rag system.",
  "key_points": [
    "Traditional Rag systems use a vector database to retrieve information and combine it with a prompt to generate an output.",
    "Agentic Rag systems use intelligent agents to handle complex tasks and make decisions dynamically.",
    "In Agentic Rag, the agent takes the decision of which vector database to query based on the input query.",
    "The agent is integrated with the retriever tools to route the query to the relevant database.",
    "The agent can handle multiple vector databases and make decisions based on the input query."
  ],
  "action_items": [
    "Convert a traditional Rag system to an Agentic Rag system by integrating intelligent agents.",
    "Use retriever tools to route the query to the relevant database.",
    "Add multiple vector databases and handle complex tasks dynamically."
  ],
  "topics": [
    "Traditional Rag",
    "Agentic Rag",
    "Vector Database",
    "Intelligent Agents",
    "Retriever Tools",
    "Routing"
  ]
}
